amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following: LIMITATION ON USE OF FUNDS FOR POLYSTYRENE CONTAINERS SEC. 211. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to obtain polystyrene containers for use in food service facilities of the House of Representatives.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 112-173 to prohibit the use of funds for polystyrene containers in the food service facilities of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 234 (Roll no. 628).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
